GIANT TREES! GENERAL USEFUL COMMANDS SUCH AS "/sethome; /spawn"! ACTIVE ADMINISTRATORS! ANTI-GRIEF! DONATOR LAND!

item.title: [No grief] [24/7] Two Creepers One Craft [Live Map] [Economy]
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

The use of “NO LAGG!” is misleading, because lag varies significantly with geographical location. Unless of course you run servers around the world.

Also, your uptime is not “24/7” because your status image reports 99.7%.

Read full topic
